item.description:

item.title: Signs leading to dog poop bags left on pavement, 26th July
item.description:
Please, Westminster, put up some crystal clear signs. E.g. “Bag and bin your dogs poo”. Current signs are vague e.g. “Clean up after your dog” means to some people here that they can then leave the bag on the pavement. See photos. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montagu Square, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a leak coming from my neighbors overflow tank at 17 Corsley Way, London E9 5PD which has been leaking for almost a year now causing water damage and a horrible algae stench. This could be addressed and fixed., 25th July
item.description:
